benchmark_details.name: GOBench (Geometric Optics Generation and Understanding Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: GOBench is the first benchmark to systematically evaluate MLLMs’ ability across two tasks: 1) Generating Optically Authentic Imagery and 2) Understanding Underlying Optical Phenomena.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate Multi-modal Large Language Models’ (MLLMs) abilities in geometric optical generation and understanding.

data.source: GOBench-Gen-1K, a dataset of 1k images focusing on geometric optics scenarios.
data.annotation: Manually filtered and graded by human experts

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on human ratings on a scale for authenticity, aesthetics, and fidelity.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to optical principles.
methodology.baseline_results: Optical Authenticity scores up to 4.09 for GPT-4o-Image.
methodology.validation: Results are validated by comparing model scores against human expert consensus.
